articles.title: Ariana Grande Announces New Album for 2024 - Variety
articles.description: Ariana Grande has confirmed her new album will arrive in 2024.
articles.content:
Ariana Grande is making her grand return in 2024 with a new album, the star confirmed on Wednesday morning with a series of social media posts.
“See you next year,” Grande wrote in the caption to a … [+1371 chars]

articles.title: Heidi Klum Shows Off Sexy Sparkly Bra During Dance to 'All I Want for Christmas Is You' - PEOPLE
articles.description: Heidi Klum posed in a sexy sparkly bra next to her husband Tom Kaulitz in a new series of Instagram posts on Christmas Eve. In one post, Klum danced to "All I Want for Christmas Is You."
articles.content:
Heidi Klum is showing some skin this holiday!
